Module.Content:
<script language="javascript">
 	function onAppLaunch() {
	 	<!-- latch onto the frame -->
		var prefs = new _IG_Prefs();
	}
 </script>
 <iframe name="appFrame" id="appFrame" onload="onAppLaunch()" src="http://www.flatown.com/g3p/g3p.html" style="border:0;width:100%;height:100%" scrolling="no"></iframe>
